Subject: Urgent: Oracle Cloud Services Outage – Now Extended Until 5:00 PM GST
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be advised that the Oracle Cloud services outage is still ongoing and has now been further extended by another hour. The expected resolution time is now 5:00 PM GST today.

 

Updated Outage Window:

Date: Monday, 19th May 2025
Time: 11:30 AM – 5:00 PM GST

 

Service Impact:
The outage continues to primarily affect the Store Inventory Operations Cloud System (SIOCS), resulting in full service downtime during this extended period.

Known Current Impacts:

*	SIOCS Integration and Application remain unavailable.
*	No inbound or outbound transactions are being processed to/from SIOCS.
*	Sales data is not integrating into SIOCS.
*	While XStore remains operational, please note: 

	*	SIOCS will reflect inaccurate stock levels due to the absence of sales integration and posting from XStore.
	*	Stock deltas are not functioning.
	*	Access to and operations within SIOCS are unavailable.

*	RICS and XOC services remain down.
